Term.Name: south
Term.Definition: B south C if and only if, in the dimension x, B starts after or at the same time as C starts and B ends at the same time as or before C ends, or B starts at the same time as or before C starts and B ends after or at the same time as C ends; and, in the dimension y, B ends at the same time as or before C starts.

Term.Name: north
Term.Definition: Inverse relation of south

Term.Name: west
Term.Definition: B west C if and only if, in the dimension x, B ends at the same time as or before C starts; and, in the dimension y, B starts after or at the same time as C starts and B ends at the same time as or before C ends, or B starts at the same time as or before C starts and B ends after or at the same time as C ends.

Term.Name: east
Term.Definition: Inverse relation of west

Term.Name: northwest
Term.Definition: B northwest C if and only if, in the dimension x, B ends at the same time as or before C starts; and, in the dimension y, B starts after or at the same time as C ends.

Term.Name: southeast
Term.Definition: Inverse relation of northwest

Term.Name: southwest
Term.Definition: B southwest C if and only if, in the dimension x, B ends at the same time as or before C starts; and, in the dimension y, B ends at the same time as or before C starts.

Term.Name: northeast
Term.Definition: Inverse relation of southwest

Term.Name: left
Term.Definition: B left C if and only if, in the dimension x, B ends at the same time as or before C starts.

Term.Name: right
Term.Definition: Inverse relation of left

Term.Name: below
Term.Definition: B below C if and only if, in the dimension y, B ends at the same time as or before C starts.

Term.Name: above
Term.Definition: Inverse relation of below

Term.Name: over
Term.Definition: B over C if and only if, in the dimension x, B starts at the same time as or before C starts and B ends after C starts, or B starts after C starts and B starts before C ends; and, in the dimension y, B starts at the same time as C ends.

Term.Name: under
Term.Definition: Inverse relation of over

Term.Name: equals
Term.Definition: B equals C if and only if B is equal to C.

Term.Name: inside
Term.Definition: B1, B2, ..., Bn is inside C if and only if the union of B1, ..., Bn is a subset of C

Term.Name: contains
Term.Definition: Inverse relation of inside

Term.Name: covers
Term.Definition: B1, B2, ..., Bn covers argument C if and only if the union of B1, B2, ..., Bn contains C AND that union is not equal to C

Term.Name: coveredBy
Term.Definition: Inverse relation of covers

Term.Name: overlaps
Term.Definition: B overlaps C if and only if B intersect C has non-empty interior

Term.Name: touches
Term.Definition: B1, B2, ..., Bn touches argument C if and only if B union C is connected

Term.Name: disjoint"
Term.Definition: B is disjoint with C if and only if the intersection of B and C is empty.

Term.Name: separated
Term.Definition: E is separated from O if and only if the intersection of E and the closure of A is empty AND the intersection of the closure of E with O is empty.
